# Private Blockchain Application

## Test the project

### Task 1: GET http://localhost:8000/block/height/0

get result
{
    "hash": "a64273909cb4124b13614e054fa09f77703aa290ebae3e41e89423d889af2074",
    "height": 0,
    "body": "7b2264617461223a2247656e6573697320426c6f636b227d",
    "time": "1645763276",
    "previousBlockHash": null
}

### Task 2: POST http://localhost:8000/requestValidation

Use Bitcoin core to get address mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP
get the response "mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP:1645769802:starRegistry"

### Task 3: SIGN Message using bitcoin core

    "address" : "mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP",
    "message" : "mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP:1645769802:starRegistry",

get    "signature" : "H9w/aKxXTD4DAjb5ePojGhw6p+Y3owMegg4y9blK+inGDgHUuLUds6/ZBbF/blHd6AJQJjWX1+B/Bp6OBRWobeU=",

### Task 4: submitStar http://localhost:8000/submitstar

using input body 
{
    "address" : "mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP",
    "signature" : "H9w/aKxXTD4DAjb5ePojGhw6p+Y3owMegg4y9blK+inGDgHUuLUds6/ZBbF/blHd6AJQJjWX1+B/Bp6OBRWobeU=",
    "message" : "mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP:1645769802:starRegistry",
        "star": {
            "dec": "68° 52' 56.9",
            "ra": "16h 29m 1.0s",
            "story": "Testing the story 4"
		}
}

get results
{
    "hash": "ca9921c9f6311d540986ab4acd875544991408269f1ae8c1d73011b1f8925eb5",
    "height": 1,
    "body": "",
    "time": "1645769884"
}

### Task 5: getBlockByHash and getStarsByWalletAddress

http://localhost:8000/block/hash/ca9921c9f6311d540986ab4acd875544991408269f1ae8c1d73011b1f8925eb5
get results
{
    "hash": "ca9921c9f6311d540986ab4acd875544991408269f1ae8c1d73011b1f8925eb5",
    "height": 1,
    "body": "",
    "time": "1645769884"
}

http://localhost:8000/blocks/mfzEm7XMz36dyRFT6rkX2KjkbhS6Vm8RQP
get results
[
